abstract: Buffalo Bills will sign tight end Charles Clay to $38 million, five-year deal after Miami Dolphins decline to match offer; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Miami Dolphins decided against matching the contract offer that tight end Charles Clay had received from Buffalo, an A.F.C. East rival.

headline.main: Dolphins Decline to Match Bills’ Bid for Charles Clay
headline.print_headline: Dolphins Decline to Match Bills’ Bid for Clay

snippet: The Miami Dolphins decided against matching the contract offer that tight end Charles Clay had received from Buffalo, an A.F.C. East rival.
